entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
